file.title: GeoIP File (.mmdb)
file.description: Select an uploaded Maxmind database or specify path to a Maxmind database with .mmdb extension

inField.title: IP Field
inField.description: Field name where to find an IP to lookup, can be nested

outField.title: Result Field
outField.description: Field name where to store the GeoIP lookup results

extraInField.title: IP Field
extraInField.description: Field name where to find an IP to lookup, can be nested

extraOutField.title: Result Field
extraOutField.description: Field name where to store the GeoIP lookup results
